# Introduction

Tidy Tuesday assignment #8 on digital publications from 2022-04-05 data.

# Load libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(beyonce)
library(showtext)
library(ggplot2)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(mapproj)
```

# Load data
```{r}
news_data <- read_csv(here("Tidy_Tuesday_8/data","news_orgs.csv"))
glimpse(news_data)
view(news_data)
```

# Data wrangling 
```{r}
news <- news_data %>%
  select(publication_name, city, state, country, year_founded) %>%
  filter(state %in% c("CA","NY"))
view(news)

ca_news <- news %>%
  select(publication_name, city, state, country, year_founded) %>%
  filter(state == "CA") 
glimpse(ca_news)

ny_news <- news %>%
  select(publication_name, city, state, country, year_founded) %>%
  filter(state == "NY") 
glimpse(ny_news)
```
